queries.name: 1. Instances of bot:Zone (bot:Site, bot:Building, bot:Storey and bot:Space instances)
2. Zones contained in a bot:Storey instance (same results as bot:hasSpace)
3. Zones contained in the bot:Site instance (bot:containsZone is transitive and a super-property of bot:hasBuilding, bot:hasStorey and bot:has:Space)
4. Elements contained in the bot:Site instance (bot:containsZone/bot:containsElement is a property chain axiom)
5. Elements contained in the bot:Site instance (bot:containsZone/bot:hasElement is a property chain axiom)
6. Wall widths inherited from their type
